text:
@CashApp $truthtellah

I'm a home healthcare worker in Texas who is in mandatory quarantine under suspicion I have Covid19 but no tests are available. 

Anything to help me afford rent and daily necessities over the next few weeks would be amazingly appreciated.

https://t.co/KcYX4R400k

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
